LanguageData.Bullet_Sentinel.label: plasma sphere
LanguageData.AD_Sentinel.label: plasma rifle
LanguageData.AD_Sentinel.description: Rare and gruesome weapon even in the Federation standards, "Sentinel" is a personal portable plasma weapon. It fires small bursts of magnetic cells that contain metal plasma.
LanguageData.AD_Sentinel.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.AD_Sentinel.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_PBomb.label: plasma bomb
LanguageData.AD_PBomb.label: plasma bomb
LanguageData.AD_PBomb.description: A portable plasma reactor converted to suicide bombing.
LanguageData.Bullet_AuxPistol.label: energy bolt
LanguageData.AD_AuxPistol.label: auxiliary pistol
LanguageData.AD_AuxPistol.description: A crude, mass produced version of more delicate Negotiator pistol.
LanguageData.AD_AuxPistol.tools.0.label: grip
LanguageData.AD_AuxPistol.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Bullet_MCrucibleRifle.label: energy bolt
LanguageData.Gun_MCrucibleRifle.label: makeshift crucible rifle
LanguageData.Gun_MCrucibleRifle.description: An improvised crucible firearm, constructed by adapting broken federation weapon parts. While it sharing some features of real crucible weapons, its crude design limits its performance as a slow firing, low quality weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_MCrucibleRifle.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Gun_MCrucibleRifle.tools.1.label: barrel
